name: RAINBOW BULLET
description:
--- GAME IS STILL IN BETA RELEASE! PLAY TEST WHILE YOU CAN! ---

RAINBOW BULLET A GAME WHERE COLOR MATTERS.

Welcome to RAINBOW BULLET, where your bullets can only kill enemies with the same color as it is, can you survive infinitely in this somewhat difficult feat? Let's see for yourself.

Weapon Unlocks
Weapons unlock for every 3 waves completed.

Controls

WASD - Move around
Hold Left Alt - Color wheel to change color.
1-4 - Cycle through weapons.
Space - Dash.
Mouse Wheel - Zoom in or out.
Hold Shift - Walk.

Weapon Pickups

In the game, there are randomized weapon pickups, here are the ones available:

  • Demonic - Bullets travel faster, and also have 50% less cooldown on your dash.
  • Rainbow - All living enemies will instantly die.
  • Adrenaline - You move faster.
  • Reversal - Your bullets heal you, and their bullets damage them.
  • Reflection - Your bullets bounce all around.
  • Big Health - Heals 75% of your health.
  • Small Health - Heals 25% of your health.

Notice

The game is still in the beta stage, you may play the game but expect some bugs and some crashes. Thank you!
